title: ConOps
description: In ConOps the nissar are hard at work to keep Santa Paws' workshop running smoothly, providing help, fluff, and answers to all Yule needs!

title: Floating Christmas Table
description:
We’ve gone all-out to offer a special trip for you! Previous years, we have organised excursions to Stockholm giving you the chance to see the zoo, the historical museum at Skansen, the centre of town by day and by the scary ghost-filled night. But there is one place we have not yet taken you! This year, you get the chance to see the picturesque winter city from the waterside!

This year's excursion will be a grand triplet of the amazing waterfront of the capital of Sweden, the unique flavours of traditional Swedish food in a massive smörgåsbord and a boat trip, seeing how the winter sun sets over Stockholm and how the winter lights of the magic city make the snow twinkle in the dark. No refunds if there’s no Aurora Borealis to be seen though.

title: Party Bus - Meet & Greet
description: Are you a party animal who likes to meet new furs while enjoying a cold one? Then the Party Bus - Meet and Greet might be for you! The event will take place during the early bird day (Tuesday) and will consist of a 1:30 hour journey around the suburbs surrounding the convention. We have a decent selection of animal themed beverages to offer. Each attendee with a ticket will receive a stamp card that can be used to get any of our available beverages. A stamp card will be worth about 5-6 drinks/beverages, of course including alcohol free alternatives. Further information, scheduling, and ticket information can be found on the NFC website!

title: Waffles
description:
Make your own Waffle, grab a glass in the bar and pour in the iron, follow the timer and get your own waffle. Then pick your toppings: Whipped Cream, Jam, Banana Slices, Nugatti and sit down and enjoy.
There is of course Waffle Wednesday 15:00 as (almost) every week in Stockholm.

title: Bar open hours
description: Come to the bar and try some of our themed cocktails and shots, or one of the classics, or just a simple beer or juice or soda.

title: Event holders Meet & Greet
description: This is a get-together for us event holders and others interested in organising events at future conventions. A chance to mingle, and also a chance to meet the awesome event crew so you know who to turn to when you need anything.

title: SOUP briefing
description: A short introductory briefing for the convention’s volunteers, the SOUP – Some Other Useful Personnel. If you are interested in volunteering at the convention, drop by and meet us!

title: Opening Ceremony
description: Come and join the Grand Opening Variety Show Extravaganza at the Main Stage where we start the convention with a bang! Also lots of useful information for the convention we recommend not missing out on.

title: Opening Ceremony Stream
description: Come and join the Grand Opening Variety Show Extravaganza at the Main Stage where we start the convention with a bang! Also lots of useful information for the convention we recommend not missing out on.

title: Wednesday Waffles
description: The tradition of Wednesday Waffles, usually on Old Town Stockholm, has to move to the convention because the organisers happen to be there. So lets meet down at the bar for a traditional Swedish furmeet.

title: Lottery booth
description: Visit our Charity lottery booth and support our charity: Svenska Djurambulansen! Buy lottery tickets, buy tickets for our special charity events, or make a donation. You can also borrow a donation bag and collect donations yourself. There are many ways to help and every contribution is greatly appreciated.

title: Glögg and fika sampling
description: Only for those with a valid glögg-sampling ticket! The sampling itself consists of four different glöggs of traditional and exotic flavours, with matching Yule treats to enjoy on the side. This event is spread out over different time slots (and one last slot to collect anyone that could not make it). We host the event in an ordinary hotel room. Your ticket says when you are welcome. If the time does not fit, try to change it with someone else; there is a Telegram group for this to make it easier.

title: So This Is Your First Furry Con?
description: Convention? Confused or confounded? Let furry veteran Ethan Staghorn advise you on how to make the most out of your furry convention! This event is highly recommended if you haven’t been to a furry con before and also provides an opportunity to meet some of your fellow first-timers.

title: Meet our Guests
description: What does the Guest of Honour like to eat for dessert? Has the Northern Light ever been outside the Arctic Circle? Have either of them ever been on the naughty list? This is your chance to ask the questions you've always wanted to ask. Delve into the details as we let our Guest of Honour pontificate and let the Northern Light shine. There will be a short presentation, followed by a Q&A; during which they will endeavour to answer your burning queries and hot topics of the moment.

title: Role Play Game Meet and Greet
description: A general meet up for those playing or just curious about tabletop role playing games to chat about the games and learn how they work, or just relate their favourites. Anyone is welcome and there will also be details announced for the games which are running throughout the convention that you can join.

title: Eurovision fans meet and greet
description:
Eurovision fans Meet & Greet!
Come and hang out in a Eurovision bubble with fellow ESC fans.

title: Cheese & Wine Reception
description:
Are you a cheese and wine loving fur? Do you like meeting other people with the same interests for cheese and wine? Then you are officially invited to Birdy's Cheese & Wine Reception!

Feel free to bring your own wine if you would be interested at sharing it with others!

changedFrom.title: Cheese & Wine Reception
changedFrom.description:
Are you a cheese and wine loving fur? Do you like meeting other people with the same interests for cheese and wine? Then you are officially invited to Birdy's Cheese & Wine Reception!

Feel free to bring your own wine if you would be interested at sharing it with others!

title: Swe Fur Meetup NFC2019
description: A meet & greet for Swedish Furries and people who want to be more Swedish. We meet at the atrium over the reception.

title: Pub quiz
description:
A classic British/Irish pub quiz, ideal to make new friends or have fun with your pre-existing ones! The participants, grouped into teams, will try to answer the preposterous and ridiculous questions of the evil quizmaster!

Who will win the yummy prizes? Who will be eaten by the fishes? Come play and you'll find out!

The idea for this event was TOTALLY not stolen from Confuzzled.

title: Avian Meet & Greet
description: Birds of a feather flock together! Come hang out (or perch) with your fellow feathered critters or swoop in to make new friends.

title: Furpile and games
description: Do you wanna lay on a bed of floof? Do you want to witness a cluster of suits and maybe some small games like Twister too? Come join us!

title: RPG Track Newbie Friendly Game
description:
Following the success of the Dungeons and Dragons game last year NordicFuzzCon are expanding the role playing game track to include several game systems and settings.

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

title: Guess The Story
description: A small game where an audience member is taken from the group as the rest of the group thinks up a scenario. The Chosen One is brought back in to guess what it is using yes or no questions.

title: Dutch Angel Dragon species panel
description: This panel is for everyone who is interested in the fictional species called Dutch Angel Dragon. Whether you are already familiar with these creatures or not, we invite you all to come and enjoy yourself. Meet other members of this community or simply find out why they have nothing to do with the Netherlands. Have fun and get answers to your questions from an official species moderator.

title: Cubfur meet & greet
description: A meet and greet for cubs, caretakers, and anyone who is interested. Come hang out with old and new friends! We may or may not have cookies.

title: Vore Meet & Eat
description: A meet and greet specifically for all voraphiles in the fandom. There's no need to be shy, we're a very welcoming bunch, we'd love to add you to our middl- erm, midst.

title: Fursuit Friendly dance
description: Exactly what the name suggests! A dance with fursuit-friendly music in a room with a lot of fans so you'll be sure to keep that tail moving all night.

title: Inflatable Fur meet and greet
description: The inflatable community meet and greet at NordicFuzzcon 2019 is the place to meet (and greet) other fans of inflatable toys and share information, stories, and (some) of your toys! Expect some squeaky fun while nerding around with pumps and vinyl. But remember to leave the sharp objects in your room and keep it squeaky clean.

title: Infra City Breakfast
description: The breakfast buffet, with the usual scrambled eggs, pancakes and bacon. Different kinds of diary like the exotic fil, different kinds of breads and things to put on them. If you have dietary requirements, there is a fridge in the back for lactose, gluten and vegan desires.

title: ConOps
description: In ConOps the nissar are hard at work to keep Santa Paws' workshop running smoothly, providing help, fluff, and answers to all Yule needs!

title: International Cheese Exchange!
description:
Do you love cheese like us? Would you like to share and taste different cheeses from around the world? Then you are welcome to join Flacko's and Birdy's International Cheese Exchange!

Feel free to bring your own cheese if you would be interested at sharing it with others!

title: RPG Track Dragonstorm
description:
Following the success of the Dungeons and Dragons game last year NordicFuzzCon are expanding the role playing game track to include several game systems and settings.

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

title: Costume makers meet and greet
description:
Do you like making stuff? Would you like to meet other makers? Then join us for the Costume/Suit makers meetup! Bring your cosplays/suits to show them off and discuss the techniques you're using. Bring and share your ideas and the challenges your facing related to creating the magic. 
It doesn't matter if you've been making suits for 10 years or is just starting out, everyone is welcome!

Fursuits are allowed (and encouraged!). Be aware that this will be a magic breaking zone, as we're focusing on construction and that you’re supposed to show you achieve the magic!

title: Dealers' Den
description: Looking to commission some art or buy a cool new bit of merchandise to show all your friends? Forgot your tail and need a new one? Want to get a nice furry book to read? Look no further! The Dealers' Den has a varied selection of furry artists and there's bound to be something that catches your eye.

title: Lottery booth
description: Visit our Charity lottery booth and support our charity: Svenska Djurambulansen! Buy lottery tickets, buy tickets for our special charity events, or make a donation. You can also borrow a donation bag and collect donations yourself. There are many ways to help and every contribution is greatly appreciated.

title: Waffles
description:
Make your own Waffle, grab a glass in the bar and pour in the iron, follow the timer and get your own waffle. Then pick your toppings: Whipped Cream, Jam, Banana Slices, Nugatti and sit down and enjoy.
There is of course Waffle Wednesday 15:00 as (almost) every week in Stockholm.

title: Bar open hours
description: Come to the bar and try some of our themed cocktails and shots, or one of the classics, or just a simple beer or juice or soda.

title: Bouncy castle
description: Come bounce in our little bouncy castle! Last years bouncy castle event was so popular we decided to bring a little bounce with us this year too. Fun for suiters and non-suiters alike!

title: Dealers' Den Sponsors Only
description: Looking to commission some art or buy a cool new bit of merchandise to show all your friends? Forgot your tail and need a new one? Want to get a nice furry book to read? Look no further! The Dealers' Den has a varied selection of furry artists and there's bound to be something that catches your eye.

title: Graphite Techniques by Oakspirit
description: When learning to draw with graphite, knowing the fundamentals is key. In this workshop our Northern Light Oakspirit will demonstrate his techniques to you and perhaps even share some secrets to show you how to get into the art of graphite. Bring your pen and paper with you, and get ready to learn and have fun!

title: Pokémon Go Meet & Trade
description: Meet & Greet for Pokémon Go players to trade, exchange friend codes or band together for a legendary raid.

title: Nerf War
description: Do you have a beef with your comrades? Or do you just like to swing some foam? Then you should come down and have some fun! Pro tip: you have more lives in suit! If you have a blaster, bring it! There is a limited number of blasters available to borrow.

title: Steven Universe meet and greet
description: Enjoy the Crystal Gems, the Diamonds, and all of Steven Universe? Come to the Steven Universe meet and greet where we will talk about the show, view fan art, and possibly watch something! If you have any real life gemstones, synthetic real or replica, feel free to bring them, raw, geode, polished, anything goes!

title: Meet a Greymuzzle
description:
For those new to the fandom who have not been around for a long time, this is your chance to hear how it was like 10 - 20 years ago in this circus they call the furry fandom from experienced veterans.

For us greymuzzles, this is a chance to meet the newcomers and help them understand that we also come here to meet people and have fun. It is also a chance for us to hear how it is to be new and young in the fandom.

title: Arcade Room
description: Deck the arcade halls with bouts of glory as you decorate Nakatomi Plaza with bad guys, snowboard down the steepest mountains, clear all the arctic zones and brawl in the snowiest arenas. Welcome all, kits and greymuzzles, to this year’s edition of the arcade room, the ”Toybox”, and experience toys of gaming past, present and future~

title: Role Play Game GMing round table
description: A place for folks interested in Tabletop Roleplaying Game Mastering  to get together and share ideas on different ways to run a game, with advice from expenced GMs in attendance to share their views. Come along and talk about your favourite games and adventures.

title: Art Show Sponsors Only
description:
Going once, going twice, sold!
Welcome to the Art Show, a place where you can bid to win exclusive pieces of arts and craft. Artists from across the continents come here to show off their finest wares, all for your attention. From one-off prints, to fursuits, jewellery and rare commission slots, there will always be something to catch your eye. Don’t forget, we also show items where the whole profit goes straight to charity. The process is based on silent bidding, and those items whose sheets fill up fast will find themselves in the live auction. Once there, who knows what can happen! Bidding wars can be intense. So come and take a look around, see what takes your fancy, and get bidding!

title: HAM-fur Meet&Greet + Radio FoxHunt Contest
description:
Meet up with fellow amateur radio furs, have a chat or two about what you do with the hobby. Eventually we'll send out a fox carrying a UHF beacon, and it's up to us to find its hiding place!

You bring your own gear for the contest. A handheld capable of receiving AM at 433MHz is highly recommended.

description: Looking to commission some art or buy a cool new bit of merchandise to show all your friends? Forgot your tail and need a new one? Want to get a nice furry book to read? Look no further! The Dealers' Den has a varied selection of furry artists and there's bound to be something that catches your eye.

changedFrom.title: Dealers' Den
changedFrom.description: Ever wondered how other cultures celebrate the holidays? Come join Kascade as he talks you through the world's way of celebrating the most magical time of the year. Hear stories of English tradition, of American Patriotism, and places far far further away, as you eat, drink, and have a merry time!

title: RPG Track Tower on the Rocks
description:
Following the success of the Dungeons and Dragons game last year NordicFuzzCon are expanding the role playing game track to include several game systems and settings.

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

title: Meet the charity
description: Our charity this year is Svenska Djurambulansen, and this interactive show-and-tell is your chance to meet them and hear the funny, the sad, the interesting and the moving stories. They are bringing dogs, they are bringing an entire animal ambulance, and they are bringing you the opportunity to see what it looks like inside! How will the money we raise help them, and what can we as furries do to help animals? Come to see and listen!

title: Café Snowglobe
description: Come to the Snowglobe Cafè and enjoy some fluffy company with our butlers and maids! We have fika! We have warm beverages! We even have our own coffee machine!

title: Furry Gamedevs Meet & Greet
description: Are you an aspiring, current, or former game developer, or gripped with questions for people in the industry? Come and mingle with the furs who make games you love, or the opposite!

title: How to hold a panel
description: Are you nervous to talk in front of people? Would you like to hold a panel at NFC or other conventions? We will talk about things like how to be prepare, how not to be scared of the tech, and everything else you need to consider when holding your panel. This panel starts 10 minutes early, because that is the minimum time you should be there beforehand to make sure everything works.

title: A guide to furry Filmmaking (Skits and Convideos)
description: Four experienced video furs will take you through the entire process of creating great furry video content. Learn all the ins and outs of furry filmmaking with tips and tricks, dos and don'ts, and practical examples. You will be a pro in no time!

title: "Fur in Motion" - Basic Fursuit Electronics Panel
description: Want to change your expression at the touch of a button? Want to wag your tail, twitch your ears, and unfold your wings? Adding a few motors to your costume can produce great effects! While the mechanisms are the subject of many good online tutorials, the electrical side is often handled frighteningly optimistic. That’s where this panel comes in: how to drive the motors reliably, without setting yourself on fire.

title: Taco Buffet
description:
And the taco buffet is back this Thursday, as always. Costing 160 SEK you have free roam of the endless table (serving 350 people):
Nacho Crisps and Tortilla flat breads
Mince meat, Chilli sin Carne (beans without meat)
Cucumber, Lettuce, Tomato, Corn, Sour-cream, Onion, Cheese, Salsa.

title: Pagan Fur meet up
description:
The Pagan Fur meet up is for fellow furries that also see them selfs as pagan. Pagan is an umberella therm for asatru/norse belief, shamanism, wicca, witchcraft, ceremonial magicians, esotericism, occultism. 

We meet up, have a nice social chat with fellow pagans. It is also fine if you bring hotel bought drinks from the bar to this event.

title: Trans*Furs Meet & Greet
description: A meet&greet for anyone that is searching or under the trans* umbrella already. The meet&greet is a safe space for sharing experiences and asking questions. Allies are welcome.

title: Sushi Go! Tournament
description: Sushi go party! Tournament

The sampling itself consists of four different glöggs of traditional and exotic flavours, with matching Yule treats to enjoy on the side. If the time does not fit, try to change it with someone else; there is a Telegram group for this to make it easier.

title: Dalziel's live show (original electronic music)
description: Dalziel brings his live original electronic music show to NFC for the first time! From synthwave to future bass, trance to cheesy 90s-style dance, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Do you enjoy drifting to eurobeat? Dalziel has you covered! With his trusty keytar and aided by live guest singers, the English dragon promises a memorable and entertaining show. Come along and dance, or just sit and listen - however you want to do it, just enjoy the show!

description:

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

title: Winter Wonder Bar
description: A lounge winter bar to have some drinks and make new friends while listening to some nice music.

title: Fursuit Charades Sign Up
description: Do you want to be on stage and perform in our fursuit charades? Of course you do! :D Come – in full or partial fursuit – and sign up right here! Space is very limited (12 suiters).

changedFrom.title: Fursuit Charades Sign Up

title: Fursuit Charades
description: Come see this classic parlour game in a way that puts a whole new twist in the tail! In our signature fursuit charades, fursuiters act out words or phrases without squeaking as much as a word, while you in the audience shout wild guesses at the stage. Lots of laughs!

title: Fur-e-oke
description: Let out your inner animal and howl/meow/chirp/rawr along to classic songs of all genres (not just winter holiday music)! Open for all, regardless of state of inebriation and/or lack of singing voice.

title: Infra City Breakfast
description: The breakfast buffet, with the usual scrambled eggs, pancakes and bacon. Different kinds of diary like the exotic fil, different kinds of breads and things to put on them. If you have dietary requirements, there is a fridge in the back for lactose, gluten and vegan desires.

title: ConOps
description: In ConOps the nissar are hard at work to keep Santa Paws' workshop running smoothly, providing help, fluff, and answers to all Yule needs!

title: Art Show Opening Times
description:
Going once, going twice, sold!
Welcome to the Art Show, a place where you can bid to win exclusive pieces of arts and craft. Artists from across the continents come here to show off their finest wares, all for your attention. From one-off prints, to fursuits, jewellery and rare commission slots, there will always be something to catch your eye. Don’t forget, we also show items where the whole profit goes straight to charity. The process is based on silent bidding, and those items whose sheets fill up fast will find themselves in the live auction. Once there, who knows what can happen! Bidding wars can be intense. So come and take a look around, see what takes your fancy, and get bidding!

changedFrom.title: Art Show Opening Times

title: RPG Track Christmas Shopping in the Zone
description:
Following the success of the Dungeons and Dragons game last year NordicFuzzCon are expanding the role playing game track to include several game systems and settings.

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

title: Waffles
description:

There is of course Waffle Wednesday 15:00 as (almost) every week in Stockholm.

You can also hide up on the second floor if you just want to stay away.

title: Solstice Slaughter (HH)
description:
In the deepest and darkest of winter, all that grows is long dead and one must sing and dance loud enough to keep the beasts of frost from one's door. But take the wrong turn on that snowy forest path, leave the warmth of your house at the wrong time of night, and your life is forfeit. We wait for you in the cold dark corners of the world, we will feast on your hot blood when you take a wrong step!

MIDVINTERBLOT! The Lords of the Solstice shall devour you!

The Haunted House Shall Return. NordicFuzzCon 2019.

Do not stray from the path. Winter has come.

title: Fursuit Zoo
description: Come and play together with our fursuiters in this interactive “zoo” with toys and games! The event is also part of the Open House and will be open for non-attendees.

description: Are you a fan of musicals who love to see the actors dressed up as animals? Who’s heart melts when you see Cats or The Lion King? title: *CANCELLED* Wolfgang Doe - A new anthro web series
description:
The story of "Wolfgang Doe "centers arround the character Wolfgang Doe, an anthrophomorphic wolf, that solves crimes in the city of Stuttgart, Germany.
In his latest case, he wants to find a murderer who kills humans and beasts alike without having a clear motive. When Wolfgangs girlfriend is captured too the case becomes private for the wolf.

Come and be one of the first people, who see exclusive footage from the first episode as well as an inside look into the production. Learn about the creators and the plans they have with this special project.

title: Swe Fur Meetup NFC2019
description: A meet & greet for Swedish Furries and people who want to be more Swedish. We meet at the atrium over the reception.

title: Freelance or Studio Artist? Making your artist life right
description: If you're a budding artist, have you ever asked yourself: “Is freelance or studio work better for me?” The Guest of Honour will loosen his tongue and share his experiences as a studio artist with us. He's sure to have good advice: what it's like being in the industry, the pros and cons of the lifestyle, being able to direct a project and see it through to the end. These are all topics that he may wish to talk about, so do join in, if you wish to glean his wisdom.

title: Charity Concert
description: This is the time for something beautiful, funny and magical. We have gathered amazingly talented musicians to create a great music event. Don’t miss this wonderful moment and help our Charity at the same time.

title: Introduction to Hand-Puppeteering
description:
What could be better than a fursuit? One that fits on your paw, in your hand-luggage, and within anyone's budget!

Learn the basics of walk-around hand-puppetry with Wah, Lindt, and friends. Covers different types of puppet, taking care of your friend, creating and playing a character, props, and more. Bring one from home, or try one of the samples!

title: Glögg and fika sampling
description: Only for those with a valid glögg-sampling ticket! The sampling itself consists of four different glöggs of traditional and exotic flavours, with matching Yule treats to enjoy on the side. This event is spread out over different time slots (and one last slot to collect anyone that could not make it). We host the event in an ordinary hotel room. Your ticket says when you are welcome. If the time does not fit, try to change it with someone else; there is a Telegram group for this to make it easier.

title: Lucia parade
description: When the winter nights are long and dark, we light candles to shine through the darkness and keep evil spirits at bay. Put on your white costume and come join the Lucia walk to bring light and joy around the convention. Both suiters and non-suiters are welcome. For last minute signups or further information, please contact @Dragon_Pancake on Telegram.

title: Luciavaka (Nightly Party)
description:
There will be free pizza (until it runs out), games, drinking, and potentially many more activities. Additionally, there will be a small prize for those partying with us till midnight!

So feel free to come and party with us at room 935 in the Party Wing area. This will be a BYOB party, so feel free to bring your own drinks and party like a fuzzy animal!

title: Gryphonpages - The Panel
description:
"Gryphonpages" is an informative and educational panel about the canon of mythological bird creatures, especially gryphons. The name honors the historical research of Eclipse Gryphon who is the owner of Gryphonpages.com.

We'll tell you things about gryphons you probably didn't know before! Why are Hippogryphs impossible? Find out why!

Also, we'll do a "Gryphon collectors show and tell" - feel free to bring any kind of gryphon (or other mythological bird) merchandise, art, or trinkets you own to show them off!

title: Gingerbread a la Charity
description:
Are you up for a challenge? Are you ready to compete in this year’s tastiest event? If you are, then we dare you to join The Gingerbread House Building Competition! There will be prizes worth fighting for, and do not forget the delicious fika that comes afterwards!

Or if you just want to watch? Tickets to this extravagant event can be bought at the charity booth!

title: Bouncy castle
description: Come bounce in our little bouncy castle! Last years bouncy castle event was so popular we decided to bring a little bounce with us this year too. Fun for suiters and non-suiters alike!

Don't forget, we also have items where the proceeds go straight to charity.

The process is based on silent bidding, and those items which sheets fill up will proceed to the live auction. Once there, who knows what can happen! Bidding wars can be intense. So come and take a look around, see catches your eye, and get bidding!

Improv game! A Trainee prepared a powerpoint presentation just for you! but no time to prepare! you have to go on stage and try to be credible as you discover the content of the Slides you must talk about!
Talking Critters/fursuiters are Welcome!

description: Deck the arcade halls with bouts of glory as you decorate Nakatomi Plaza with bad guys, snowboard down the steepest mountains, clear all the arctic zones and brawl in the snowiest arenas. Welcome all, kits and greymuzzles, to this year’s edition of the arcade room, the ”Toybox”, and experience toys of gaming past, present and future~

title: RPG Track The Yuletide Star
description:
Following the success of the Dungeons and Dragons game last year NordicFuzzCon are expanding the role playing game track to include several game systems and settings.

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

title: Fursuit Gameshow
description: Brave the cold winds and snowy terrain to ensure this will be a yuletide to remember! This year our participants must ensure that everything gets prepared for the special evening. Decorating, packing, collecting, and more. Perhaps even sneaking away with a fresh cookie or two. Come watch the spectacle and cheer on our contestants as they struggle with fun and silly challenges.

title: How to use acrylic inks in your painting
description: Acrylic inks are a fun and versatile way to add color to a completed art project, or they can be used alone to create a painting. Our Northern Light Oakspirit will demonstrate his acrylic ink techniques with a live painting workshop where you can join to ask him questions and paint along with him.

title: Furries Got Talent
description:
It's that time of year, fur friends, when the temperature drops but the heat turns up! 
There's snow business like show business, so we have rounded up a herd of the most dazzling array of acts this side of the Arctic Circle. A snowcase of lights  awaits you inside, so come on in for an evening of our participants who want to do their very best to ensure you leave with a beaming smile.

title: Glögg and fika sampling
description: Only for those with a valid glögg-sampling ticket! The sampling itself consists of four different glöggs of traditional and exotic flavours, with matching Yule treats to enjoy on the side. This event is spread out over different time slots (and one last slot to collect anyone that could not make it). We host the event in an ordinary hotel room. Your ticket says when you are welcome. If the time does not fit, try to change it with someone else; there is a Telegram group for this to make it easier.

title: Femdom: Busting myths
description: The speaker will describe the basics of Female Domination and the ways it can be practiced. The focus of the presentation will be a list of myths, and the speaker will comprehensively debunk them and explain what is actually true. After the presentation it will become a general meet and greet where people can talk about their preferences and experiences as dommes and submissives.

title: Light and Lighting for Visual Artists
description: Light and lighting in photography, drawings, and 3D rendering. What is light, what are colour and contrast, what’s the difference between soft and hard light, how to use highlights and shadows to show shapes, how to do light placement, show light motivation, high and low key, and more.

title: Holidays around the World
description: Ever wondered how other cultures celebrate the holidays? Come join Kascade as he talks you through the world's way of celebrating the most magical time of the year. Hear stories of English tradition, of American Patriotism, and places far far further away, as you eat, drink, and have a merry time!

title: How to animate Kéké style
description:
Ever wanted to know exactly how our Guest of Honour works his magic? He has flair, panache and a good ol' Nintendo 3DS with Flipnote Studio 3D! If you want to learn from the master, if you'd like to get to grip with his top tips, bring along your creative sparkle, your sense of fun and your own 3DS with Flipnote Studio 3D installed.
(Please note that whilst we may try to loan our guests a 3DS, we cannot guarantee enough for everyone.)

title: How did I get here?!
description: As baffling as it might sound, I am not a furry, so how did I end up here?! So let's see how I as a non-fur got here, what enjoyment I find at conventions, and what friends I’ve made along the way.

title: Cats and Boxes
description: Calling all feline fursuiters... a room full of boxes. You want to sit in the boxes, don't you? Turn up on time for a cat-box photoshoot! You want to wreck the boxes afterwards and make a mess, don't you? Of course you do! Photographers and cardboard box lovers also welcome.

title: Winter Wonder Bar
description: A lounge winter bar to have some drinks and make new friends while listening to some nice music.

title: Melodi Grand Prix viewing party
description: Come join the fun as 10 Norwegian artists compete for the right to represent Norway in the Eurovision Song Contest at this Melodi Grand Prix viewing party. Bring a drink and enjoy the show!

title: Secret Santa
description:
Have you heard? There will be a Secret Santa event held during NFC! So bring your friends along for a merry time!

But what do you need to do to participate?

Step 1: A gift worth between 50 - 150 SEK (you may go over, but keep in mind that you might not receive the same value back).

Step 2: Turn your gift in to ConOps and you will receive a ticket with a number on it (like a lottery ticket). You get to keep one half of that number, the other part gets put in the big red cardboard mailbox at ConOps! Please write your e-mail or Telegram on the backside!

Step 3: Wait for the gift exchange to start! Once your number has been pulled (be there or else you will get one of the leftover gifts!), you get to pick a package from the gift pile.

Step 4: Enjoy your gift! Happy howlidays!

title: The Pawnel
description: THE PAWNEL! An introduction to the world of paws!

title: After Bark Charades Sign Up (NSFW)
description:
Do you want to be one of sex… um, six fursuiters on stage during our After Bark Fursuit Charades? Please cume (huh huh) in costume 60 minutes before the charades start if you wish to participate, as we need to prepare the phrases with you.
We will also try to rig your costume with electroluminescent wire and run the charades in the dark. (Some costumes might not be possible to wrap in wire and therefore ineligible to participate.) Be aware that you will need to stay in fursuit for one to two hours in a row and that there might be close bodily contact in intimate places for certain charade phrases.

title: Fursuit Charades After Bark (NSFW)
description:
OwO What's this? *notices ur event*
Our After Bark Fursuit Charades are your chance to shout obscenities at fursuiters in a fun and consensual environment. If we get our way, the room will be dark so that no one can see you blush, and the fursuiters will be lit with electroluminescent wire.
NB: Not recommended for the pure of heart or the easily offended! Photography is prohibited at this event. Fursuiters sign up 60 minutes before; see separate event.

title: Late night Sauna and Pool
description: The sauna and pool is open until 02:00 so even the worn out STEW will have time to enjoy a soak.

title: Infra City Breakfast
description: The breakfast buffet, with the usual scrambled eggs, pancakes and bacon. Different kinds of diary like the exotic fil, different kinds of breads and things to put on them. If you have dietary requirements, there is a fridge in the back for lactose, gluten and vegan desires.

title: ConOps
description: In ConOps the nissar are hard at work to keep Santa Paws' workshop running smoothly, providing help, fluff, and answers to all Yule needs!

title: RPG Track Cat got your prince
description:
Following the success of the Dungeons and Dragons game last year NordicFuzzCon are expanding the role playing game track to include several game systems and settings.

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

title: Lottery draw
description: Have you bought lottery tickets? Now it’s time to see if you’ve won! During the lottery event we will make a live draw for the pick-a-prizes and larger items you might have seen at our charity booth. We will also be bringing back the quiz game from last year. Be there or miss out!

title: Lottery booth
description: Visit our Charity lottery booth and support our charity: Svenska Djurambulansen! Buy lottery tickets, buy tickets for our special charity events, or make a donation. You can also borrow a donation bag and collect donations yourself. There are many ways to help and every contribution is greatly appreciated.

title: Waffles
description:
Make your own Waffle, grab a glass in the bar and pour in the iron, follow the timer and get your own waffle. Then pick your toppings: Whipped Cream, Jam, Banana Slices, Nugatti and sit down and enjoy.
There is of course Waffle Wednesday 15:00 as (almost) every week in Stockholm.

title: Bar open hours
description: Come to the bar and try some of our themed cocktails and shots, or one of the classics, or just a simple beer or juice or soda.

title: Closing Ceremony
description: Had enough of the convention? Come and follow the proceedings as we make sure to bury it as deep as where it came from. Also be prepared for the Big Surprise Reveal™ where we basically tell you that we're doing this again next year!

title: Closing Ceremony Stream
description: Had enough of the convention? Come and follow the proceedings as we make sure to bury it as deep as where it came from. Also be prepared for the Big Surprise Reveal™ where we basically tell you that we're doing this again next year!

title: Yard Sale
description: Buy posters, decorations, and more at the annual NordicFuzzCon Yard Sale! The Yard Sale starts right after Sunday’s Closing Ceremony and can be found by the escalators next to the 2nd Hotel Entrance.

title: Feedback session
description: What was awesome this year? What can we do better? Come and share your thoughts for the convention to hear! (Or, even better, offer to join us and show us how things can be improved).

title: No unisex Sauna
description: Sunday from 15:00 until 22:00 we cannot have unisex or booked sauna as usual during the con. At 22:00 it will be possible till 02:00 again, since we have the sauna open for just attendees, so enjoy.

title: Doodles for Charity
description: Missed out on getting furry art? We got the perfect quick fix for you! All while helping the charity at the same time! In the lottery booth talented furry artists will draw for you for only 100 SEK – some of them will even draw in fursuit! So come on down and get rid of your spare change before leaving and get some nice furry art in the process.

title: Bouncy castle
description: Come bounce in our little bouncy castle! Last years bouncy castle event was so popular we decided to bring a little bounce with us this year too. Fun for suiters and non-suiters alike!

title: RPG Track Long arm of the hutt
description:
In a galaxy far far away under the scorching rays of Tatooine twin Sun
In the narrow streets of the scorching City of Mos Shuuta.
Where most people have taken cover for the midday Heat.
You can find Our Heroes running through the streets.
While being chased by several green-skinned Gamorrean guards.

Come join us to play the Star Wars Adventure, and see if our heroes can make it through the dangerous streets off Mos Shuuta in this introductory game to Star Wars edge of the empire.
